name: Turkey Gravy
steps: Gather all drippings from Jake's Roasted Turkey and let separate
The provided amounts are estimates, save everything you gather
Heat Butter and exactly 4 Tablespoons of the fatty drippings
Once melted and hot, slowly whisk in flour
Keep whisking and cooking for like 3 minutes
Slowly whisk in Turkey Stock bit by bit
Whisk in all delicious watery drippings you can gather (not fatty)
Keep on heat, stir, and let reduce until at the desired consistency
comments: If there are more non-fatty turkey drippings than 1 Cup, definitely use all you have
